lyrics.zht: 轉眼走到了 自傳最終章 已瀏覽所有 命運的風光
lyrics.zhp: zhuǎn yǎn zǒu dào le zì zhuàn zuì zhōng zhāng yǐ liú lǎn suǒ yǒu mìng yùn de fēng guāng
lyrics.eng: In the blink of an eye, the autobiographical final chapter has browsed all the scenery of destiny

lyrics.zht: 混濁的瞳孔 風乾的皮囊 也曾那般 花漾
lyrics.zhp: hún zhuó de tóng kǒng fēng gān de pí náng yě céng nà bān huā yàng
lyrics.eng: Turbid pupil, air-dried skin, also used to be like a flower

lyrics.zht: 最愛的相片 讓你挑一張 千萬個片刻 誰在你身旁
lyrics.zhp: zuì ài de xiàng piàn ràng nǐ tiāo yī zhāng qiān wàn gè piàn kè shuí zài nǐ shēn páng
lyrics.eng: Favorite photo Let you pick a million moments Who is by your side
